title: Balance Body Wash - Makes Scents Natural Spa Line
author: Name
description: Balance Body Wash provides luxurious, gentle cleansing and leaves dry skin looking and feeling soft and healthy while essential oils of orange, grapefruit..
cleaned_text: Description KEY NATURAL INGREDIENTS: ORANGE, GRAPEFRUIT, LAVENDER & PATCHOULI Balance Body Wash provides luxurious, gentle cleansing and leaves dry skin looking and feeling soft and healthy while essential oils of orange, pink grapefruit, lavender and patchouli balance and uplift the senses. Recommended for all skin types. FREE OF: sulfates, parabens, formaldehyde, artificial colors, artificial fragrances, mineral oil, petroleum, urea, mineral oil, petroleum, PG (propylene glycol), PEG (polyethylene glycol), alcohol, 8 fl oz. INGREDIENTS: Aqua (Water), Citrus Paradisii Peel Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Pogostemon Cablin (Patchouli) Oil. USE: Apply daily for all over body application in the shower. Apply to damp skin with sponge or wash cloth. Rinse well. Towel dry and apply Balance Body Butter.
